
=head1 NAME

chapter

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 title (character varying(256)) - 
 number (integer) - 
 identifier (character varying) - 
 report (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                               Table "gcis_metadata.chapter"
    Column   |          Type          | Modifiers | Storage  | Stats target | Description 
 ------------+------------------------+-----------+----------+--------------+-------------
  title      | character varying(256) |           | extended |              | 
  number     | integer                |           | plain    |              | 
  identifier | character varying      | not null  | extended |              | 
  report     | character varying      |           | extended |              | 
 Indexes:
     "chapter_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "chapter_report_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (report) REFERENCES report(identifier)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "figure" CONSTRAINT "figure_chapter_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (chapter) REFERENCES chapter(identifier)
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
